i18n.key: width of this map, default width taken in module preferences
height of this map, default height taken in module preferences
Maximized width of this map, the default value is extracted from module preferences.
Maximized height of this map, the default mvalue is extracted from module preferences.
Specifies if the markers are extracted from the folder only or also from the subfolders.
This option allows offering the visitor the possibility of downloading the map marker in GPS compatible formats.
Height of this map, the default value is extracted from module preferences.
Width of this map, the default value is extracted from module preferences.
This option allows offering the visitor the text list of markers shown on the map.
